reviews.review: This game has been very fun and overall great to play, though some of the players can be abrasive...

Só tem gente toxica e hacker nesse jogo, a unica coisa boa do jogo é os mapas de Zombies Escape, onde vc ajuda os outros a passarem do mapa enquanto protege eles dos "zombies".

Counter Strike Global Offensive is an extremely fun game to play with freinds. There is some cheaters or smurfs (a player from a high rank playing in a lower so it is easier) in the silver ranks but it is still fun. The community is quite good although you may meet some idots here and there. It has got a high learning curve but once you understand or whatch some tutorials it becomes easy.
Like a slightly worse Rainbow Six

Valves main focused Compeitive kahouna itself, CSGO, you can get skins, Sprays, Rank up, and blame people when your team fails, CSGO a great game if your really compeitive, or just wanna play for the memes the game (in all honesty) is alright, gun play is great, gameplay is great, the community is uh...kinda out there, but in all seriousness the game is great would recomend on reddit
